alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lowndes, central Thomas and central Brooks Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 537 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pavo to near Thomasville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quitman, Thomasville, Valdosta, Pavo, Morven, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Dillon, Patten, Oaklawn, Merrillville, Brooks Co A/p, Blue Springs, Hollis and I-75 At Exit 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
